chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (u v u' v' : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m u' -> u <> u' -> v <> v' -> betweenf m u' u v' /\ betweenf m u' v v' -> betweenf m u u' v /\ betweenf m u v' v \/ betweenf m (cF m v) u' (cF_1 m u) /\ betweenf m (cF m v) v' (cF_1 m u)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
betweenf = MF.between : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
dart = nat : Set
betweenf_expf : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> betweenf m z v t -> expf m z v /\ expf m z t
MF.between_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.between m z v t -> MF.expo1 m z v /\ MF.expo1 m z t
MF.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MF.f m) j z = t /\ i <= j < MF.Iter_upb m z : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), expf m z t -> expf m t u -> expf m z u
MF.expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), MF.expo m z t -> MF.expo m t u -> MF.expo m z u
Iter_cF_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> Iter (cF (I m x u p)) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
cF_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> cF (I m x u p) z = cF m z
expf_L0_CN_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t
expf_L1_II_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t
expf_L1_II_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_B0_CS_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 \/ betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
cA_1_I : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> x <> z -> cA_1 (I m x u p) k z = cA_1 m k z
expf_L0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in (if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z \/ expf m z t) -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L1_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in (if expf_dec m x y0 then betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0) -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_L1_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in if expf_dec m x y0 then betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0
expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_B0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in (if expf_dec m x0 xb0 then betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 \/ betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m xb0 z /\ expf m x0 t \/ expf m xb0 t /\ expf m x0 z \/ expf m z t) -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expf (B m zero x) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in if expf_dec m x0 xb0 then betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 \/ betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m xb0 z /\ expf m x0 t \/ expf m xb0 t /\ expf m x0 z \/ expf m z t
expf_L0_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t < -> (let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0)
expf_L1_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m one x y) z t < -> (let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in if expf_dec m x y0 then betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0)
expf_B0_CN_i : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let t := Iter (MF.f (B m zero x)) i z in let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in if expf_dec m x0 xb0 then betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 \/ betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m xb0 z /\ expf m x0 t \/ expf m xb0 t /\ expf m x0 z \/ expf m z t
expf_B0_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expf (B m zero x) z t < -> (let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in if expf_dec m x0 xb0 then betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 \/ betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m xb0 z /\ expf m x0 t \/ expf m xb0 t /\ expf m x0 z \/ expf m z t)
expf_B0_CS_1_a_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_a : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_b_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_b : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m xh0_1 t x0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
McF.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
McF.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cF_1 m z)
exd_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cF_1 m z)
expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel2 : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_b_prel2 : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
cF_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in betweenf m x_1 z y -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec y z then x_1 else cF m z)
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z

```intros m u v u' v' H1 H2 H3 H4 [H5 H6].
apply NNPP; intro H7.
right. split.
- apply expf_B0_CS_1_b with m v v'; assumption.
- apply betweenf_expf with m v' v u; assumption.
Qed.```
